channel.title: ESPN: Bill Don't Lie
channel.description: ESPN's Bill Simmons talks hoops and only hoops with NBA players, ex-coaches, esteemed media personalities and buddies with no credentials whatsoever.
channel.itunes:subtitle: ESPN's Bill Simmons talks hoops and only hoops with NBA players, ex-coaches, esteemed media personalities and buddies with no credentials whatsoever.

item.title: Bill Don't Lie - Tom Haberstroh
item.description: Bill talks to ESPN's Tom Haberstroh about the predictability of the Cavaliers, Blake Griffin's playoff performance, and the future of the Miami Heat.
item.itunes:title: Bill Don't Lie - Tom Haberstroh
item.itunes:author: ESPN
item.itunes:subtitle: Bill talks to ESPN's Tom Haberstroh about the predictability of the Cavaliers, Blake Griffin's playoff performance, and the future of the Miami Heat.

item.title: Bill Don't Lie - Zach Lowe
item.description: Zach Lowe joins Bill to break down the Spurs-Clippers series, the numerous injuries in the NBA playoffs, and the rest of the major stories thus far.
item.itunes:title: Bill Don't Lie - Zach Lowe
item.itunes:author: ESPN

item.title: Bill Don't Lie - Joe House and Sean Grande
item.description: Bill's buddy Joe House comes on to break down Round 1 of the NBA playoffs. And the voice of the Boston Celtics, Sean Grande, looks at the matchup with the Cavs.

item.title: Bill Don't Lie - Chris Ryan and Andrew Sharp
item.description: Grantland's Chris Ryan and Andrew Sharp talk to Bill Simmons about the Thunder's playoff chances and the 76ers' tanking strategy, and wonder whether DeMarcus Cousins could get traded.

item.title: Bill Don't Lie - Zach Lowe
item.description: Zach Lowe joins Bill Simmons to discuss Anthony Davis, the MVP race, and how Kawhi is looking like a top-10 player. Then they break down the NBA season by the numbers.
